sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"作者，作家"之意。
means: author ：泛指用自己名字或笔名发表过作品的人，不强调是否以写作为主职业。
writer ：含义广泛，一般指以写作为职业的人。

sentence.Network_en: James Fox is best known as the author of White Mischief.
sentence.Network_cn: 詹姆斯·福克斯以《欲望城》一书最为出名.

sentence.Network_en: She's indexed the book by author, by age, and by illustrator.
sentence.Network_cn: 她根据作者、年龄和插图画家分别为该书编了索引。

sentence.Network_en: The author distanced himself from some of the comments in his book.
sentence.Network_cn: 作者使自己书中的某些评论不带个人色彩。

那么授权（Authorization）又是什么呢？授权通常是用来回答以下问题：用户A是否被授权访问资源R 用户A是否被授权执行P操作

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'a person who invents or causes something'): from Old French autor, from Latin auctor, from augere 'increase, originate, promote'. The spelling with th arose in the 15th cent., and perhaps became established under the influence of authentic

entry.def: The author of a piece of writing is the person who wrote it.

example.ex: ...Jill Phillips, author of the book 'Give Your Child Music'.
example.tran: 吉尔·菲利普斯，《给孩子音乐》一书的作者

entry.def: An author is a person whose job is writing books.

example.ex: Haruki Murakami is Japan's best-selling author.
example.tran: 村上春树是日本当红的畅销书作家。

entry.tran: (计划或建议的）筹划者，制定者
entry.def: The author of a plan or proposal is the person who thinks of it and works out the details.

example.ex: The authors of the plan believe they can reach this point within about two years.
example.tran: 该计划的提出者相信他们约在两年内可以达成该目标。

entry.def: To author something means to be the author of it.

example.ex: Then he opened a restaurant, authored a book, and landed his own radio show.
example.tran: 后来他开了个餐馆，写了本书，还制作了自己的广播剧。

example.ex: ...a proposal authored by subcommittee chairman Quentin Burdick.
example.tran: 专门小组委员会主席昆廷·伯迪克提出的建议

means.word_mean: 1. writes (books or stories or articles or the like) professionally (for pay)
2. someone who originates or causes or initiates something;

sentences.sentence: "he was the generator of several complaints"

auth_sentence.content: Steve Rosenbaum is the author of "Curation Nation"
auth_sentence.res_content: Steve Rosenbaum is the author of "Curation Nation"
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Steve Rosenbaum is the author of "Curation Nation"

auth_sentence.content: Instead the author trots out the old academic solution.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead the author trots out the old academic solution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead the author trots out the old academic solution.

auth_sentence.content: Don't remember the title or author, though.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't remember the title or author, though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't remember the title or author, though.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩

sentences.en: Do you read many French authors?
sentences.cn: 你阅读过许多法国作家写的书吗?

means.word_mean: 创造者, 创始人; 发起人

sentences.en: As the author of the scheme I can't really comment.
sentences.cn: 我作为这一计划的创始人是不便置评的。

jushi.english: As the author of the scheme I can't really comment.
jushi.chinese: 我作为这一计划的创始人是不便置评的。

jushi.english: Do you read many French authors?
jushi.chinese: 你阅读过许多法国作家写的书吗?

jushi.english: He was the author of the plot.
jushi.chinese: 他是这一试验田的策划者。
